title: Typeface Tag
content:
Sign up for Typeface Tag   
   
Each player will have 24 hours to contribute to an   
original typeface 3 new characters inspired by previous   
letters. Over many turns where the most desirable traits   
are emphasized players should evolve a mutually   
agreeable alphabet. When the typeface is complete, it   
will be compiled and distributed to all. Submit name   
and email for play at [Type Club](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018031350/http:/www.typeclub.org/).   
   
News bite courtesy [Typographica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018031350/http:/www.typographi.ca/) and Brett Jackson.
author: Joe Pemberton
